title: Mono comp inefficient because P exceeds MC

content.prompt: Monopolistically competitive product markets are inefficient because

choices.label: price equals the marginal value to the buyer of the last item produced
excessive competition prevents other firms from entering the market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
